did.unittitle: Frances Perkins Letter to Donald Stetson
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Letter of January 16, 1948 from Frances Perkins to Donald G. Stetson, thanking him for his letter of January 9 and congratulating him on his admission to Cornell University.

scopecontent.p: This collection includes a letter from Frances Perkins to Donald Stetson, dated January 16, 1948. Also included are letters relating to the donation of the letter to the Labor-Management Documentation Center in 1979.

controlaccess.corpname: New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.
